description:
My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

This is a one-bedroom apartment in the Washington Heights neighborhood. 
Fully decked out kitchen with sitting area and all appliances.

Kitchen: Breakfast area, gas stove/oven, fridge, freezer, microwave. Plates, glasses, cutlery, pots, pans etc for your use.

Living room: Comfy couch, dining area.

Bedroom: Bed and small desk.

I'm available 24/7 by AirBnb message, email, or phone.

Nearby Amenities: The Cloisters Art Museum (part of the Met), Inwood Hill Park, Morris-Jumel Mansion, Highbridge Park.

3 minutes' walk to the 1 train direct train service to Harlem, Columbia University, Upper West Side, Columbus Circle, Times Square, penn Station, Midtown, Financial District, Downtown. 10minutes' walk to the A train express service to Upper West Side, Midtown and Downtown.
name: The Magic Johnson (II)
review: Joshua was a helpful and nice host.
